name: WhoseTurn
0:
”Alexa, open Whose Turn”
”Alexa, ask Whose Turn whose turn it is to pick a restaurant”
”Alexa, ask Whose Turn who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose turn
des: Next time you find yourself arguing your right to win the chess match or even your right to watch the telly, don't worry because Alexa is here to save the day by choosing who is going to win.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
